member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.cb
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.CommitTotal
member.summary: The number of pages currently committed by the system. Note that committing pages (using with MEM_COMMIT) changes this value immediately; however, the physical memory is not charged until the pages are accessed.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.CommitLimit
member.summary: The current maximum number of pages that can be committed by the system without extending the paging file(s). This number can change if memory is added or deleted, or if pagefiles have grown, shrunk, or been added. If the paging file can be extended, this is a soft limit.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.CommitPeak
member.summary: The maximum number of pages that were simultaneously in the committed state since the last system reboot.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.PhysicalTotal
member.summary: The amount of actual physical memory, in pages.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.PhysicalAvailable
member.summary: The amount of physical memory currently available, in pages. This is the amount of physical memory that can be immediately reused without having to write its contents to disk first. It is the sum of the size of the standby, free, and zero lists.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.SystemCache
member.summary: The amount of system cache memory, in pages. This is the size of the standby list plus the system working set.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.KernelTotal
member.summary: The sum of the memory currently in the paged and nonpaged kernel pools, in pages.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.KernelPaged
member.summary: The memory currently in the paged kernel pool, in pages.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.KernelNonpaged
member.summary: The memory currently in the nonpaged kernel pool, in pages.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.PageSize
member.summary: The size of a page, in bytes.

member.name: PERFORMANCE_INFORMATION.HandleCount
member.summary: The current number of open handles.
